name: Ricky
title: Taata papa'i hoho'a
summary: Te imi nei te hoê taata hamani hoho'a aravihi i te mau rave'a apî no te rave i te ohipa no te mau opuaraa rahi. Te anaanatae nei au i te hamani e aore râ, i te faaô atu i te mau waehere no vetahi ê ia faaohipa. Te ti'aturi nei au e, e mea iti roa to'u aravihi ia faaauhia i te itenati, no reira, te anaanatae nei au i te rave i te ohipa e te tahi atu mau rave'a, mau taviniraa, e te mau reo faanahoraa.

education.degree: Tiwhikete no te rave'a hamaniraa tauihaa

education.school: Te fare haapiiraa tuatoru no te hau no Kalifonia
education.location: Fullerton, Kalifonia, Hau Amui no Marite

education.degree: Diploma no te fare haapiiraa tuarua
education.location: Irvine, Kalifonia, Hau Amui no Marite

experience.title: Taata papa'i hoho'a
experience.location: Irvine, Kalifonia, Hau Amui no Marite
responsibilities: Ua papa'ihia e ua faaohipahia te mau rave'a Itenati ma te faaohipa i te React e te Node.js
No te haamaitai i te mau titauraa e no te haapapu i te hooraa i te taime au, ua rave amuihia te ohipa e te feia faatere o te mau tao'a
Ua hamanihia e ua tape'ahia te mau RESTful API no te mau faaohiparaa i te itenati
Ua hamanihia mai te mau papa'iraa no te faatere i te mau ohipa e no te haamaitai i te aravihi

experience.title: Tauturu faaineine tennis
experience.location: Irvine, Kalifonia, Hau Amui no Marite
responsibilities: Te haapiiraa i te mau rave'a tennis i roto i te hoê pŭpŭ e 5-10 feia hauti
Te faariroraa i te haapiiraa ei mea arearea e te arearea no te feia hauti
Te hopoi'a no te parururaa i te feia hauti i ni'a i te tiribuna, te feia hauti apî ihoa râ e te feia paari, mai te mau tamarii e 3 matahiti e te 60 matahiti

experience.title: Hoa i rapae
experience.location: Irvine, Kalifonia, Hau Amui no Marite
responsibilities: Te faaho'i-faahou-raa mai i te mau tao'a i ni'a i te vairaa
Te ma'itiraa i te mau faaueraa no te feia hoo tao'a i ni'a i te itenati
Te mau faaueraa no te tonoraa
Te hopoiraa i te mau faaueraa i nia i te mau pereoo tarahu
Te tautururaa i te feia hoo ia imi i te mau tao'a i roto i te fare toa
Te tapearaa i te fare vairaa tauihaa ia mâ e ia faanaho-maitai-hia
Te tape'araa i te hoê vahi paruruhia e te auhoa no te feia hoo tao'a e te feia rave ohipa

projects.name: Pūpū
projects.description: Te hoê tahua itenati e faaite ra i te mau opuaraa e te mau aravihi ma te faaohipa i te mau rave'a aravihi apî
